ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes that identify a previous history of having received the pneumococcal vaccine.),(Data Element Scope: This value set was intended to identify patients who were assessed to determine if they received a pneumococcal vaccine.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes codes that identify a pneumococcal vaccination was given in the past.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that indicate a pneumococcal vaccine was currently being given.)
